Network

Class ClientConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Network.ClientConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientConnectorInterface

    public class ClientConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientConnectorInterface
    ClientConnector is the class that implements the peer 2 peer communication between server and client, The server has one for each client, and the client has one for the server.
